description: For a secret that is replicated to other Regions, deletes the secret replicas from the Regions you specify. Secrets Manager generates a CloudTrail log entry when you call this action. Do not include sensitive information in request parameters because it might be logged. For more information, see Logging Secrets Manager events with CloudTrail. Required permissions: secretsmanager:RemoveRegionsFromReplication. For more information, see IAM policy actions for Secrets Manager and Authentication and access control in Secrets Manager.

parameters.name: SecretId
parameters.description: The ARN or name of the secret.

parameters.name: RemoveReplicaRegions
parameters.description: The Regions of the replicas to remove. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of the primary secret.

nested_items.name: ReplicationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of replicas for this secret after you remove Regions.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: Can be an ARN, Key ID, or Alias.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status can be InProgress, Failed, or InSync.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: Status message such as 'Secret with this name already exists in this region'.

nested_items.name: LastAccessedDate
nested_items.description: The date that the secret was last accessed in the Region. This field is omitted if the secret has never been retrieved in the Region.
